## Reddit Templates

### r/javascript
```
Title: Wenfit Validator now has GitHub Sponsors - Support Universal TypeScript Validation

Hey r/javascript!

I'm the creator of Wenfit Validator, a universal validation library for TypeScript/JavaScript. I've just enabled GitHub Sponsors for the project.

**What is Wenfit Validator?**
- Universal validation that works everywhere (React, Vue, Angular, NestJS, Express)
- Full TypeScript support with automatic type inference
- Tiny bundle size (7.7KB gzipped)
- 279+ tests with property-based testing

**Why Sponsor?**
The project is completely free and open-source, but maintaining it takes significant time. Sponsorship helps with:
- New features and improvements
- Bug fixes and security patches
- Documentation and examples
- Community support

**Sponsorship Tiers:**
Starting at $5/month with various tiers offering different benefits.

Check it out: https://github.com/sponsors/Hailemariyam

Happy to answer any questions!
```

### r/typescript
```
Title: GitHub Sponsors now available for Wenfit Validator - Type-safe validation library

Hi r/typescript!

I've enabled GitHub Sponsors for Wenfit Validator, a type-safe validation library with full TypeScript support.

**Key Features:**
- Automatic type inference from schemas
- Works with React, Vue, Angular, NestJS, Express
- Comprehensive TypeScript types
- Small bundle size (7.7KB gzipped)

**Why I'm Seeking Sponsors:**
Maintaining an open-source library is a labor of love, but it's also time-consuming. Sponsorship helps me dedicate more time to:
- Adding new features
- Fixing bugs quickly
- Improving documentation
- Supporting users

**What Sponsors Get:**
- Priority support
- Early access to features
- Logo placement
- Direct communication
- And more depending on tier

Learn more: https://github.com/sponsors/Hailemariyam

Questions welcome!
```

## Newsletter Template

### Subject: "Support Wenfit Validator Development - GitHub Sponsors Now Available"

```
Hi [Name],

I hope this email finds you well!

I'm reaching out to share some exciting news: GitHub Sponsors is now available for Wenfit Validator.

**What is Wenfit Validator?**
A universal, type-safe validation library for TypeScript/JavaScript that works across React, Vue, Angular, NestJS, and Express.

**Why This Matters:**
Wenfit Validator is completely free and open-source, but maintaining it requires significant time and effort. GitHub Sponsors allows the community to support the project's continued development.

**How You Can Help:**
1. Become a sponsor (starting at $5/month)
2. Share with your team/company
3. Spread the word on social media

**What Sponsors Get:**
- Priority support
- Early access to features
- Logo placement in README
- Direct communication
- And more!

Learn more: https://github.com/sponsors/Hailemariyam

Thank you for your support!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
```

## Tips for Using These Templates

1. **Personalize**: Add your own voice and experiences
2. **Be Authentic**: Share genuine reasons for seeking sponsorship
3. **Show Value**: Highlight what sponsors get in return
4. **Be Grateful**: Always thank your community
5. **Be Consistent**: Post regularly but don't spam
6. **Engage**: Respond to comments and questions
7. **Share Progress**: Update sponsors on what you're building
8. **Celebrate**: Thank sponsors publicly (if they agree)

## Posting Schedule

- **Week 1**: Initial announcement on all platforms
- **Week 2**: Feature highlight posts
- **Week 3**: Share roadmap and future plans
- **Week 4**: Thank sponsors and share progress
- **Monthly**: Update on development progress
- **Quarterly**: Major milestone celebrations
